title: Remote substrate sensors with datalogger
summary: Remote substrate sensors with datalogger to measure moisture in real time.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a remote substrate sensors with datalogger
eligible.eligibleBullet03: collect and upload data to a computer, mobile phone, or tablet for real-time analysis
eligible.eligibleBullet04: provide alerts when the growing medium is too dry
eligible.eligibleBullet05: measure moisture content in all growing mediums between 0 to 0.7m³/m³ in increments of 0.01m³/m³ with an accuracy of plus or minus 0.01m³/m³
eligible.eligibleBullet06: measure temperature between -20°C to 60°C in increments of 0.1°C with an accuracy of plus or minus 0.5°C
eligible.eligibleBullet07: measure electrical conductivity of the soil between 0 to 20dS/m in increments of 0.01dS/m with an accuracy of plus or 0.05dS/m
